metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6520 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SimpleSAMLphp before 1.15.2 allows remote attackers to bypass an open redirect protection mechanism via crafted authority data in a URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-6520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.15.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.2-1').
